text:
The words that come out of our mouth and the
thoughts that we have can be really powerful

in setting the destiny of our lives. I want
you to know that many seeds are planted in

our hearts from other people's opinion.
Maybe it's not such a positive opinion,

or it's a discouragement-maybe it's
even a lie. I want you to know that you need

to get rid of that seed of lies out of your
heart, because then something bigger is going

to become of those lies, and if a seed of
an apple gets planted, and an apple tree grows,

guess what's going to grow? Apples. If a
tree of lies grows fruit, it's going to

produce more lies. Negativity produces negativity,
love produces love. Generosity produces generosity.

Positivity produces positivity. So be careful
in what you allow your heart to receive, and
determine what fruit grows in you.
